attributes.action: Stop all companies charging more than the bill if not paid by Direct Debit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Companies put a penalty of increased charges, if you do not pay by direct debit. They get round this by giving a discount if you pay by direct debit. this must be illegal. you pay you bill by what ever means. They also have the right to remove amounts not agreed! another example of rip of britain.
